resume.name: Hubert Chen
resume.title: Hubert Chen's Resume
resume.objective: A job in systems management and architecture designing scalable systems which meet current and future business needs.

experience.title: Manager Web Engineering
experience.description: Broad range of responsibilities within Internet Operations and DevOps divisions. Planning, architecture, and system design. Day-to-day uptime and operational lead for e-commerce site with $500m/yr in sales. Lead migration of 7 PB of image data for Kodak purchase. Ad hoc data analysis. Provide operational design and architecture reviews for Engineering features. Performance testing and capacity planning. Lead CDN implementation. Worked on internal nagios and cacti monitoring systems. Provided systems capacity planning and performance evaluation for hundreds of systems. Provided JIRA and Confluence administration and support for hundreds of users.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed major portions of internet search engine. Developed large scale distributed crawling system using both Java and C++. Integrated different components in application server and developed part of presentation layer. Helped monitor and maintain uptime for 24x7 operation. Performed system administration tasks. Helped to institute source control and software development process. Rapidly learned information retrieval techniques.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed and maintained Java based workflow engine.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed core scalable, multi-tiered application server infrastructure in Java. eCRM Applications built on WebLogic application server also integrated with Oracle and a variety of other systems including search engines, payment systems, data mining, other enterprise systems.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed cryptographic and messaging protocols for electronic commerce. Worked heavily in CGI, Perl, Java and C. Designed and implemented networking code for Sm@rtcert product. Extensive UNIX, web, and network programming.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Developed Java applications and applets, for customers. Provided consulting for Internet applications. Recommended solutions for web applications. Worked on a large system which manages billing, scheduling, and ordering of commercials for cable, network TV, and radio. The three-tiered application was developed using the Dynasty Development Environment, C, and Oracle on Windows NT and UNIX.

experience.title: Programmer
experience.description: Managed Web sites on Macintosh and Unix. Developed custom Web applications for clients. Wrote CGI's and adminstrative scripts to manage Web servers. Integrated databases with the Web. Worked with clients to plan and implement Web sites. Organized team to implement and maintain web sites.

experience.title: Systems Officer
experience.description: Developed strategic technology plan for senior management. Plan included technology directions, systems development standards, and initiatives for process improvement. Performed evaluations of new technology. Developed prototype business application using Dynasty to create a three-tiered application using Microsoft Windows, HP-UX, and Sybase.
